channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 13:50 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 13:50 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #m_Marhanets_and_the_Marhanets_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
